scripts.go_mod: rimraf src/app/go.mod && rimraf src/app/go.sum && cd src/app && go mod init github.com/mt3hr/gkill/src/app && cd main/gkill && go mod tidy
scripts.clean_app_embed: rimraf src/app/gkill/api/embed/html && rimraf src/app/gkill/api/embed/i18n && rimraf src/app/gkill/api/embed/version.json
scripts.put_version_info_embed: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const pkg=require(path.resolve('package.json'));const ver=pkg&&pkg.version?String(pkg.version):'unknown';let hash='unknown';try{hash=execSync('git show --format=%H --no-patch',{encoding:'utf8'}).trim()}catch(e){hash=process.env.GITHUB_SHA||process.env.COMMIT_SHA||'unknown'};const d=new Date();const pad=n=>String(n).padStart(2,'0');const tzMin=-d.getTimezoneOffset();const sign=tzMin>=0?'+':'-';const oh=pad(Math.floor(Math.abs(tzMin)/60));const om=pad(Math.abs(tzMin)%60);const bt=d.getFullYear()+'-'+pad(d.getMonth()+1)+'-'+pad(d.getDate())+'T'+pad(d.getHours())+':'+pad(d.getMinutes())+':'+pad(d.getSeconds())+sign+oh+':'+om;const out=path.join('src/app/gkill/api/embed','version.json');fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(out),{recursive:true});fs.writeFileSync(out,JSON.stringify({commit_hash:hash,build_time:bt,version:ver},null,2)+'\n');"
scripts.prepare_install: npm run clean_app_embed && npm run put_version_info_embed && npm run build && npm run copy_dist_to_app_embed && npm run copy_i18n_to_app_embed
scripts.build_x_compile: npm run build_windows_amd64_app && npm run build_windows_amd64 && npm run build_linux_amd64 && npm run build_linux_arm64 && npm run build_linux_arm && npm run build_android_arm && npm run build_android_arm64 && npm run build_android_apk
scripts.build_windows_amd64: rsrc -ico public/favicon.ico -o src/app/gkill/main/gkill_server/resource_windows_amd64.syso -arch amd64 && unset CC && mkdirp release/windows_amd64 && cd src/app/gkill/main/gkill_server; CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 CC=x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc go build -ldflags "-s -w" -o ../../../../../release/windows_amd64/gkill_server.exe && strip ../../../../../release/windows_amd64/gkill_server.exe && rm resource_windows_amd64.syso
scripts.build_windows_amd64_app: rsrc -ico public/favicon.ico -o src/app/gkill/main/gkill/resource_windows_amd64.syso -arch amd64 && unset CC && mkdirp release/windows_amd64 && cd src/app/gkill/main/gkill/; CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 CC=x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc go build -ldflags "-s -w -H windowsgui" -o ../../../../../release/windows_amd64/gkill.exe && strip ../../../../../release/windows_amd64/gkill.exe && rm resource_windows_amd64.syso
scripts.build_linux_amd64: unset CC && mkdirp release/linux_amd64 && cd src/app/gkill/main/gkill_server; CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../../../../../release/linux_amd64/gkill_server
scripts.build_linux_arm64: unset CC && mkdirp release/linux_arm64 && cd src/app/gkill/main/gkill_server; CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 CC=aarch64-linux-gnu-gcc go build -o ../../../../../release/linux_arm64/gkill_server
scripts.build_linux_arm: unset CC && mkdirp release/linux_arm && cd src/app/gkill/main/gkill_server; CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm CC=arm-linux-gnueabihf-gcc go build -o ../../../../../release/linux_arm/gkill_server
scripts.build_android_arm: unset CC && mkdirp release/android_arm && cd src/app/gkill/main/gkill_server; CC=$NDK/toolchains/llvm/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/armv7a-linux-androideabi21-clang  CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=android GOARCH=arm go build -o ../../../../../release/android_arm/gkill_server
scripts.build_android_arm64: unset CC && mkdirp release/android_arm64 && cd src/app/gkill/main/gkill_server; CC=$NDK/toolchains/llvm/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/aarch64-linux-android21-clang  CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=android GOARCH=arm64 go build -o ../../../../../release/android_arm64/gkill_server
scripts.build_android_apk: (mkdirp release/android_apk && npm run copy_android_release && cd src/android && gradlew assembleDebug && mv app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk ../../release/android_apk/gkill.apk)
scripts.prepare_gkill_sample_data: VERSION=$npm_package_version && (copyfiles -au 2 "resources/gkill_sample_data/**/*" release/gkill_sample_data) && (copyfiles -u 2 release/windows_amd64/gkill_server.exe release/gkill_sample_data ) && ( cd release && 7za a -tzip -mx9 gkill_sample_data_${VERSION}.zip gkill_sample_data )
scripts.release: npm run prepare_install && npm run build_x_compile && VERSION=$npm_package_version && ( cd release/windows_amd64 && 7za a -tzip -mx9 ../windows_amd64_gkill_${VERSION}.zip gkill.exe && 7za a -tzip -mx9 ../windows_amd64_gkill_server_${VERSION}.zip gkill_server.exe ) && ( cd release/linux_amd64 && 7za a -tzip -mx9 ../linux_amd64_gkill_server_${VERSION}.zip gkill_server ) && ( cd release/linux_arm64 && 7za a -tzip -mx9 ../linux_arm64_gkill_server_${VERSION}.zip gkill_server ) && ( cd release/linux_arm && 7za a -tzip -mx9 ../linux_arm_gkill_server_${VERSION}.zip gkill_server ) && ( cd release/android_arm && 7za a -tzip -mx9 ../android_arm_gkill_server_${VERSION}.zip gkill_server ) && ( cd release/android_arm64 && 7za a -tzip -mx9 ../android_arm64_gkill_server_${VERSION}.zip gkill_server ) && ( cd release/android_apk && cp gkill.apk ../gkill_${VERSION}.apk ) && npm run prepare_gkill_sample_data && npm run clean_release_zip_src
scripts.clean_release_zip_src: cd release && rimraf android_apk && rimraf android_arm && rimraf android_arm64 && rimraf linux_amd64 && rimraf linux_arm && rimraf linux_arm64 && rimraf windows_amd64 && rimraf gkill_sample_data
scripts.install_app: npm run prepare_install && cd src/app/gkill/main/gkill && go install -ldflags "-H windowsgui"
scripts.install_server: npm run prepare_install && npm run go_install
